content: Bangladesh1 Dec 2025Batting for Ireland with brother 'a privilege' Ireland batter Tim Tector says playing on the same side as his brother Harry is special as the siblings aim to help the tourists secure a T20 series win over Bangladesh on Tuesday.1 Dec 20251 Dec 2025Tulip Siddiq says Bangladesh jail term is 'unfair'The MP, and niece of Bangladesh's ousted former leader, received a two-year sentence in her absence over corruption allegations. 1 Dec 20251 Dec 2025Tulip Siddiq MP given jail sentence in Bangladesh after trial in her absenceThe former minister and niece of Bangladesh's ousted former leader, who received a two-year sentence, says the charges are politically motivated.1 Dec 202529 Nov 2025Bangladesh edge out Ireland to level T20 seriesBangladesh beat Ireland by four wickets with just two balls to spare to level the T20I series between the sides.29 Nov 202527 Nov 2025Ireland in Bangladesh 2025Reports, results and scorecards from Ireland's tour of Bangladesh, featuring two Tests and three Twenty20 internationals.27 Nov 202527 Nov 2025Ireland hammer Bangladesh in opening T20Ireland bounce back from two heavy Test defeats to win the first Twenty20 International with Bangladesh by 39 runs in Dhaka. 27 Nov 202525 Nov 2025England face debutants Italy at 2026 T20 World CupEngland will face tournament debutants Italy at the 2026 Men's T20 World Cup while defending champions India and Pakistan will renew their rivalry in the group stage.25 Nov 202521 Nov 2025At least five killed in Bangladesh earthquakeThe epicentre of the earthquake was about 30 kilometres (18.6 miles) from the capital, Dhaka.21 Nov 202521 Nov 2025Earthquake interrupts Ireland Test in BangladeshThe third day of Ireland's second Test with Bangladesh is temporarily stopped by an earthquake in Dhaka on Friday.21 Nov 2025.
